alert.note: Alert for Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 27 at 11:15AM MDT until May 28 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Idaho... Trail Creek at Ketchum affecting Sun Valley Region zone. .Warm temperatures may melt high mountain snowpack and increase river flows. Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Trail Creek Ketchum 7.0 6.6 Sat 10 am MD MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. IDZ073-282200- /O.EXT.KPIH.FL.A.0006.000000T0000Z-230528T2200Z/ /TCKI1.0.SM.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NR/ 1115 AM MDT Sat May 27 2023 ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Trail Creek at Ketchum. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 6.5 feet, Near bankfull from near Corral Creek and Trail Creek to the confluence of the Big Wood River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM MDT Saturday the stage was 6.6 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
